description:
Lightweight, go-anywhere gloves to keep you active during the chilly months. Touchscreen feature helps with map reading or capturing photos and the silicone print on the fingers ensure you grip your gadgets.

  • ActiveTemp fleece regulates temperature to keep hands warm without overheating
  • Anti-slip silicone print on fingers and palm
  • Synthetic suede thumb and index tip are touch-screen compatible
  • Leather grab tab on inner wrist allows glove to be pulled on easily
name: Outdoor Research Melody Sensor Gloves - Women's
